meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla Street, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of Minutes of the February 27, 2024 Special Called City Council Meeting and February 28, 2024 City Council Meeting

agenda_items.title: Partial Settlement Authorization
agenda_items.description: Authorize partial settlement of the lawsuit styled Bridgette Dancy and Elvis Brown v. City of Dallas, Cause No. DC-21-06901

agenda_items.title: General Obligation Refunding Bonds
agenda_items.description: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, General Obligation Refunding and Improvement Bonds, Series 2024B

agenda_items.title: Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates
agenda_items.description: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas, Texas, Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation, Series 2024B

agenda_items.title: Interlocal Agreement Amendment
agenda_items.description: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 21-0362 for an Interlocal Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation

agenda_items.title: Engineering Services Contract
agenda_items.description: Authorize an engineering services contract with Michael Baker International, Inc. for a comprehensive study for an analysis of existing administrative spaces

agenda_items.title: Airport Planning Services
agenda_items.description: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the consultant services contract with Ricondo & Associates, Inc.

agenda_items.title: Food Establishments Ordinance Amendment
agenda_items.description: An ordinance amending Chapter 17, 'Food Establishments,' of the Dallas City Code

agenda_items.title: Dallas Housing Resource Catalog Amendment
agenda_items.description: Authorize an amendment to the Dallas Housing Resource Catalog (DHRC)

agenda_items.title: Cooperative Purchasing Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year cooperative purchasing agreement for Oracle database licensed products
agenda_items.presenter: Department of Information and Technology Services

financial_items.description: General Obligation Refunding and Improvement Bonds
Combination Tax and Revenue Certificates of Obligation
Amendment to Interlocal Agreement with Texas Department of Transportation
Engineering services contract for administrative spaces study
